description.en:
6th Planet, a second-hand shop that only sells Sega Saturns, introduces various Sega Saturn games with its own judgements and prejudices.

An essay comic for Sega Saturn fans by a Sega Saturn fan.
___
**Buy:**
- Volume 1: [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/ZHORO42819), [AliceBooks](https://alice-books.com/item/show/4972-1)
- Volume 2: [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/ZHORO53248), [AliceBooks](https://alice-books.com/item/show/4972-2)
- Volume 3: [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/ZHORO42820), [AliceBooks](https://alice-books.com/item/show/4972-3)
- Omnibus: [BEEP](https://www.beep-shop.com/ec/products/detail/139), [COMIC ZIN](https://shop.comiczin.jp/products/detail.php?product_id=34131), [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/ZHORO61998), [MANDARAKE](https://ec.mandarake.co.jp/order/detailPage/item?itemCode=1277161222)
